meanings.definition: Lack of sensitivity or awareness towards the feelings of others.
meanings.sent1: Her insensitiveness to her friend's sadness was evident.
meanings.sent2: His insensitiveness towards others often caused misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The insensitiveness of the robot to human emotions led to some comical situations.
meanings.sent4: The insensitiveness of the stone to the changing weather made it a symbol of endurance.
meanings.sent5: The insensitiveness of the teacher to the students' struggles made learning difficult.

meanings.definition: The state of being unresponsive or indifferent to emotional stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The insensitiveness of the patient worried the doctor.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't understand his insensitiveness towards her heartfelt gestures.
meanings.sent3: The insensitiveness of the cat to the owner's attempts at playfulness was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The insensitiveness of the old clock to the passing time was a reminder of its age.
meanings.sent5: The insensitiveness of the machine to external factors made it reliable in harsh conditions.
